lead_paragraph: PAPERT--Frederic. Frederic Papert resurrected West 42nd Street and gave Chez Josephine its home on Theatre Row. He was our champion for 30 years. We are grateful for his vision and dedication to our neighborhood, as well as his enduring friendship with our founder, Jean-Claude Baker. Deepest sympathies from the Chez Josephine family to his family and colleagues at 42nd Street Development Corp. Manuel Uzhca, Owner 1/3
